doc.field: World Trade Center. Policies & Procedures. Reference. Personal.
World Trade Center. Policies & Procedures. Reference. Personal.

Most, though not all, of the materials appear to relate to Spadafora's writings on safety issues at WTC (for WNYF in 2002 and for American Journal of Industrial Medicine) and on the AFID (Apparatus Field Investigation Duty) form, which involves hotels, cabarets, etc checks. Print matter: "Brotherhood" re WTC and "Walter the Farting Dog" (children's book), Fire Safety Directors Course for Office Buildings, Hotels & Motels; history of the NY Board of Fire Underwriters; fire law handbook, fire prevention code of NYC. Powerpoint of High-Rise Unit on-site exam procedures, 2005. Powerpoint of ICC Code Development Process. Set of files with material on homeless shelters, social clubs, etc, seemingly in connection with WNYF article (4th/2005). Files on FDNY organization and proposed Bureau of Fire Prevention (BFP) reorganization, circa 2003. Spadafora and other business cards. Artifacts: Pins, "Heroes of 2001" guest ID/lanyard. WTC Respirator Card. Floppy discs of articles. Several CDs/DVDs: emergency planning procedures for employers, building code, AFID forms & curriculum, "FDNY Health and Safety Issues, WTC" Powerpoint, October 25, 2003 ceremony, others. (Includes digital formats, artifacts)
World Trade Center. Policies & Procedures. Reference. Personal.
